item.title: Using the KiCad Footprint Wizard
item.description: Take a look at the datasheet for the TO-220 package the regulator comes in.

item.title: Assigning Footprints
item.description: Introduction Prior to transferring a schematic to a PCB design, it is necessary to assign footprints to each symbol in your schematic

item.title: Electrical Rules Check (ERC)
item.description: Introduction In the last tutorial you created a schematic. But is it any good?
